description: Creates a resource configuration. A resource configuration defines a specific resource. You can associate a resource configuration with a service network or a VPC endpoint.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If you retry a request that completed successfully using the same client token and parameters, the retry succeeds without performing any actions. If the parameters aren't identical, the retry fails. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the resource configuration. The name must be unique within the account. The valid characters are a-z, 0-9, and hyphens (-). You can't use a hyphen as the first or last character, or immediately after another hyphen.

parameters.name: portRanges
parameters.description: (SINGLE, GROUP, CHILD) The TCP port ranges that a consumer can use to access a resource configuration (for example: 1-65535). You can separate port ranges using commas (for example: 1,2,22-30). (string) ---

parameters.name: resourceConfigurationDefinition
parameters.description: (SINGLE, CHILD, ARN) The resource configuration. arnResource (dict) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource. arn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource. dnsResource (dict) --- The DNS name of the resource. domainName (string) --- The domain name of the resource. ipAddressType (string) --- The type of IP address. ipResource (dict) --- The IP resource. ipAddress (string) --- The IP address of the IP resource.

nested_params.name: arnResource
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

nested_params.name: arn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

nested_params.name: dnsResource
nested_params.description: The DNS name of the resource.

nested_params.name: domainName
nested_params.description: The domain name of the resource.

nested_params.name: ipAddress
nested_params.description: The IP address of the IP resource.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tags for the resource configuration. (string) --- The key of the tag. Constraints: Tag keys are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 128 Unicode characters. Valid characters are Unicode letters, digits, white space, and any of the following symbols: _ . : / = + - @ May not begin with aws:. (string) --- The value of the tag. Constraints: Tag values are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 256 Unicode characters. : / = + - @

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of resource configuration. SINGLE - A single resource. GROUP - A group of resources. You must create a group resource configuration before you create a child resource configuration. CHILD - A single resource that is part of a group resource configuration. ARN - An Amazon Web Services resource.

nested_items.name: allowAssociationToShareableServiceNetwork
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the resource configuration can be associated with a sharable service network.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource configuration.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the resource configuration was created, in ISO-8601 format.

nested_items.name: failureReason
nested_items.description: The reason that the request failed.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource configuration.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the resource configuration.

nested_items.name: portRanges
nested_items.description: The port range.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: protocol
nested_items.description: The protocol.

nested_items.name: resourceConfigurationDefinition
nested_items.description: The resource configuration.

nested_items.name: arnResource
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

nested_items.description: The DNS name of the resource.

nested_items.description: The domain name of the resource.

nested_items.name: ipAddressType
nested_items.description: The type of IP address.

nested_items.name: ipResource
nested_items.description: The IP resource.

nested_items.name: ipAddress
nested_items.description: The IP address of the IP resource.

nested_items.name: resourceConfigurationGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the parent resource configuration (type is GROUP).

nested_items.name: resourceGatewayId
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource gateway associated with the resource configuration.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the resource configuration.

nested_items.description: The type of resource configuration.
